snippet: The St. Louis County prosecutor’s office began releasing more records from a grand jury’s examination of the fatal shooting of Michael Brown.
abstract: St Louis County prosecutor’s office releases more records from grand jury’s examination of fatal shooting of unarmed black teenager Michael Brown by white police officer Darren Wilson in Ferguson, Mo; records include police audio and witness interviews.
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis County prosecutor’s office began releasing more records from a grand jury’s examination of the fatal shooting of Michael Brown.

headline.main: Audio and Witness Interviews Are Among Ferguson Records Released
headline.print_headline: Audio and Witness Interviews Are Among Ferguson Records Released
